title: League client or patcher isnt starting
body:
Hey
my League of Legends Client isnt starting
I am wondering why this isnt working, because a few days ago it worked.

On starting the Client, the repair tool is repairing something and after, the Logo appears, and disappears. So the problem is that the patcher/CLient isnt starting after the Logo disappears

I tried pretty everything except formatting the whole system

Including:
-Restarting PC
-Checking Antivirus
-Deleted LoL/ Reinstalled LoL
-Deleted Files in RADS folder as listed in several topics to fix it
-Disabling antivirus/Firewall to test for success
-Reinstall graphic driver

System: Windows 7
Enough space is there for files

If i missed any information you need to help me, please let me know, i wanna play :(

replies.body:
Typically whenever you see the logo appear and disappear without anything else happening, its due to League not being able to open the files it needs from permissions errors. Be sure to double check that your OS is allowing League access to the files it needs by going through the steps in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). 

If that doesn't help, reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some game logs so they can get a better idea of what's happening.
